Uses of Package
uno.anahata.asi.model.core

Packages that use uno.anahata.asi.model.core
Package
Description
uno.anahata.asi
The core package of the Anahata AI framework, containing the central orchestrator and configuration classes.
uno.anahata.asi.chat
Provides model-agnostic, intelligent configuration objects for chat sessions.
uno.anahata.asi.context
Manages the conversation history and the injection of just-in-time context.
uno.anahata.asi.context.provider
Defines the contract for providers that inject just-in-time context into an AI request.
uno.anahata.asi.gemini
Provides the concrete implementation of the anahata-ai core framework for the Google Gemini API.
uno.anahata.asi.gemini.adapter
Provides adapter classes for converting between the core domain model and the native Gemini API types.
uno.anahata.asi.model.core
Provides the core, model-agnostic domain model for all conversational AI interactions.
uno.anahata.asi.model.provider
Defines the model-agnostic interfaces and base classes for AI providers and their models.
uno.anahata.asi.model.resource
 
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool
Defines the model-agnostic domain model for the tool (function) calling subsystem.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.bad
Provides the domain model for tools that were requested by the model but could not be found.
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.java
Provides the concrete domain model for tools implemented as Java methods via reflection.
uno.anahata.asi.status
Provides classes for managing and broadcasting chat status events.
uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat
 
uno.anahata.asi.swing.chat.render
 
uno.anahata.asi.swing.internal
 
uno.anahata.asi.tool
Provides the core framework for defining, managing, and executing local Java tools.
uno.anahata.asi.toolkit
 
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi
    Class
    Description
    BasicPropertyChangeSource
    A base class providing a standard implementation of PropertyChangeSource.
    PropertyChangeSource
    A standard interface for objects that provide PropertyChangeSupport.
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi.chat
    Class
    Description
    AbstractModelMessage
    Represents a message originating from the AI model.
    BasicPropertyChangeSource
    A base class providing a standard implementation of PropertyChangeSource.
    InputUserMessage
    A specialized UserMessage designed for direct manipulation by UI components like an input panel.
    PropertyChangeSource
    A standard interface for objects that provide PropertyChangeSupport.
    RequestConfig
    The definitive, model-agnostic configuration object for a single API request.
    Response
    A standardized, model-agnostic response received from an AI model provider.
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi.context
    Class
    Description
    AbstractMessage
    The abstract base class for all messages in a conversation, providing common metadata and functionality for the rich, hierarchical V2 domain model.
    AbstractModelMessage
    Represents a message originating from the AI model.
    PropertyChangeSource
    A standard interface for objects that provide PropertyChangeSupport.
    RagMessage
    A specialized UserMessage that represents just-in-time, ephemeral context provided by the environment (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi.context.provider
    Class
    Description
    RagMessage
    A specialized UserMessage that represents just-in-time, ephemeral context provided by the environment (Retrieval-Augmented Generation).
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi.gemini
    Class
    Description
    AbstractMessage
    The abstract base class for all messages in a conversation, providing common metadata and functionality for the rich, hierarchical V2 domain model.
    AbstractModelMessage
    Represents a message originating from the AI model.
    AbstractPart
    The abstract base class for all components of a AbstractMessage.
    AbstractToolMessage
    Represents a message containing the results of tool executions.
    GenerationRequest
    A simple, immutable record that encapsulates all the information required for a model to generate content: the configuration and the conversation history.
    PropertyChangeSource
    A standard interface for objects that provide PropertyChangeSupport.
    Response
    A standardized, model-agnostic response received from an AI model provider.
    StreamObserver
    A simple interface for observing a stream of values, typically used for asynchronous token streaming from an AI model.
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi.gemini.adapter
    Class
    Description
    RequestConfig
    The definitive, model-agnostic configuration object for a single API request.
  • Classes in uno.anahata.asi.model.core used by uno.anahata.asi.model.core
    Class
    Description
    AbstractMessage
    The abstract base class for all messages in a conversation, providing common metadata and functionality for the rich, hierarchical V2 domain model.
    AbstractModelMessage
    Represents a message originating from the AI model.
    AbstractPart
    The abstract base class for all components of a AbstractMessage.
    AbstractToolMessage
    Represents a message containing the results of tool executions.
    BlobPart
    Represents a binary data part, such as an image or a document.
    FinishReason
    A standardized, model-agnostic enum representing the reason why a model stopped generating content.
    PropertyChangeSource
    A standard interface for objects that provide PropertyChangeSupport.
    RequestConfig
    The definitive, model-agnostic configuration object for a single API request.
    Response
    A standardized, model-agnostic response received from an AI model provider.
    ResponseUsageMetadata
    Metadata about the token usage for a single API response.
    Role
    Defines the role of the entity that created a message, providing a type-safe way to distinguish between user, model, and tool messages.
    TextPart
    A concrete AbstractPart implementation for simple text content.
    ThoughtSignature
    An interface for model-generated parts that can carry a thought signature.
    UserMessage
    Represents a message originating from the end-user in a conversation.
